title: Pwned Passwords Version 1
description_short: Pwned Passwords is a dataset of 306 million real world passwords previously exposed in data breaches. Released by Have I Been Pwned? in August 2017.
description_long:
This is an old version of the Pwned Passwords dataset. View the current version.

Pwned Passwords is a dataset of 306 million real world passwords previously exposed in data breaches. Released by Have I Been Pwned? in August 2017.

More info at haveibeenpwned.com (archived)
View dataset on archive.org
